title: Iron elemental
data:
***Version [0.23](/0.23 "0.23")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| iron elemental E [![Iron elemental.png](/images/8/83/Iron_elemental.png)](/File:Iron_elemental.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                      | 71-144                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                          | 12                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                                      | 891                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                                             | 6                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                                  | 20                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                            | 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                                      | Immune                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Attack1                                                                                             | 40 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                             | [rF+++](/Fire "Fire") [rC+++](/Cold "Cold") [rElec+++](/Electricity "Electricity") [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                   | None                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                                       | Land                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                                        | [Brainless](/Category:Brainless_intelligence "Category:Brainless intelligence")                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                                    | [Uses nothing](/Category:Uses_nothing "Category:Uses nothing")                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                                    | [Non-living](/Category:Nonliving_holiness "Category:Nonliving holiness")                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                                                | [Big](/Category:Big_monsters "Category:Big monsters")                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                                | elemental, iron elemental                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| Flags                                                                                               | [Unbreathing](/Unbreathing "Unbreathing")                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

|   |                                                                                                                             |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A rare and powerful spirit from the elemental plane of earth, it exists in this world by inhabiting a hulking mass of iron. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Iron elementals** are lumbering brutes with powerful spells and significant melee capabilities. They only naturally occur in the [Dungeon Sprint](/Dungeon_Sprint "Dungeon Sprint") mode.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                              |                                                      |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") (3d24)                   | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Slow](/Slow "Slow")                                         | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Metal Splinters](/Metal_Splinters "Metal Splinters") (3d27) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Iron elementals are thankfully very slow, and while their magic immunity and broad array of elemental immunities will make things difficult for casters, their physical defenses aren't insurmountable for a good melee fighter. Casters with non-elemental [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") should use those; [Airstrike](/Airstrike "Airstrike") and [Earth Magic](/Earth_Magic "Earth Magic") such as [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction") will also work.
  - Using Lee's Rapid Deconstruction will create blasts of metal shrapnel, which can deal heavy damage to anything next to the elemental.
- Their spells, though damaging, have fairly short range. [Kiting](/Kiting "Kiting") them is a decent strategy, considering their slow movement speed. A source of [Repel](/Repel_Missiles "Repel Missiles") or [Deflect Missiles](/Deflect_Missiles "Deflect Missiles") will also help, as will having high defenses.
- High magic resistance will help you avoid getting slowed.

## History

- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), they could be summoned by [the Iron Giant](/The_Iron_Giant "The Iron Giant"), a [unique](/Unique "Unique") [stone giant](/Stone_giant "Stone giant").
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), iron elementals could be found in [Dis](/Dis "Dis") and a rare mid-game [vault](/Vault "Vault").
- Iron elementals were added in [0.7](/0.7 "0.7").
html:
Iron elemental

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.23: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
iron elemental E 
HP 71-144
HD 12
XP 891
Speed 6
AC 20
EV 2
Will Immune
Attack1 40 (hit: plain)


Resistances rF+++
rC+++
rElec+++
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Non-living
Size Big
Type elemental, iron elemental
Flags Unbreathing
A rare and powerful spirit from the elemental plane of earth, it exists in this world by inhabiting a hulking mass of iron.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Iron elementals are lumbering brutes with powerful spells and significant melee capabilities. They only naturally occur in the Dungeon Sprint mode.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Iron Shot (3d24) Magical flag
Slot2 Slow Magical flag
Slot3 Metal Splinters (3d27) Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Iron elementals are thankfully very slow, and while their magic immunity and broad array of elemental immunities will make things difficult for casters, their physical defenses aren't insurmountable for a good melee fighter. Casters with non-elemental Conjurations should use those; Airstrike and Earth Magic such as Lee's Rapid Deconstruction will also work.
    • Using Lee's Rapid Deconstruction will create blasts of metal shrapnel, which can deal heavy damage to anything next to the elemental.
  • Their spells, though damaging, have fairly short range. Kiting them is a decent strategy, considering their slow movement speed. A source of Repel or Deflect Missiles will also help, as will having high defenses.
  • High magic resistance will help you avoid getting slowed.

History

  • Prior to 0.18, they could be summoned by the Iron Giant, a unique stone giant.
  • Prior to 0.14, iron elementals could be found in Dis and a rare mid-game vault.
  • Iron elementals were added in 0.7.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Iron_elemental&oldid=50895"

rawPage:
{{version023}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Iron elementals''' are lumbering brutes with powerful spells and significant melee capabilities. They only naturally occur in the [[Dungeon Sprint]] mode.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Iron elementals are thankfully very slow, and while their magic immunity and broad array of elemental immunities will make things difficult for casters, their physical defenses aren't insurmountable for a good melee fighter. Casters with non-elemental [[Conjurations]] should use those; [[Airstrike]] and [[Earth Magic]] such as [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]] will also work.
**Using Lee's Rapid Deconstruction will create blasts of metal shrapnel, which can deal heavy damage to anything next to the elemental.
*Their spells, though damaging, have fairly short range. [[Kiting]] them is a decent strategy, considering their slow movement speed. A source of [[Repel Missiles|Repel]] or [[Deflect Missiles]] will also help, as will having high defenses.
*High magic resistance will help you avoid getting slowed.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.18]], they could be summoned by [[the Iron Giant]], a [[unique]] [[stone giant]].
*Prior to [[0.14]], iron elementals could be found in [[Dis]] and a rare mid-game [[vault]].
*Iron elementals were added in [[0.7]].
